clock1: Every circle represents a minute. Starting from 12:00am a circle will be filled every minute. The circles change position every second. Completely pointless
clock2: The minutes past midnight are calculated and converted to base 3 eg. 11:59pm = 1440 minutes = 1222100. Each circle represents a digit, with the three colours representing a 0, 1, or 2. Absolutely no need.
clock3: The bars represent the current day, hour, minute and second. As time passes the bars fill up. Unnecessary.
